Credits
=======

Tramline was originally developed by Infrae (http://www.infrae.com).

Developers
----------

* Martijn Faassen (concept, developer)

* Jan-Wijbrand Kolman (concept, developer)

* Emyr Thomas (bugfixes, testing with Plone)

* Luis De La Parra (bugfixes, testing with Plone)

* Daniel Nouri (smallish improvements)

Thanks also to Guido Goldstein for forging Railroad, tramline's big
brother.
